SE23

\(SE_2(3)\) - Group of double direct isometries

class pylie.SE23

Bases: MatrixLieGroup

An instantiation-free implementation of the SE_2(3) matrix Lie group.

Methods:

Exp

Shortcut method: R^n to group directly.

Log

Shortcut method: group to R^n directly.

adjoint

Adjoint representation of group element.

adjoint_algebra

Adjoint representation of algebra element.

decompose

Deprecated.

exp

Exponential map from algebra to group.

from_components

Construct an \(SE_2(3)\) matrix from attitude, velocity, position components.

identity

Returns an identity matrix of the group.

inverse

Group inverse.

left_jacobian

Group left jacobian evaluated at x in R^n

left_jacobian_inv

Inverse of group left jacobian evaluated at x in R^n

log

Logarithmic map from algebra to group.

normalize

Eliminates rounding errors: ensures matrix is proper group element.

odot

odot operator as defined in Barfoot.

random

Return a random element of the group.

right_jacobian

Group right jacobian evaluated at x in R^n.

right_jacobian_inv

Inverse of group right jacobian evaluated at x in R^n.

synthesize

Deprecated.

to_components

Extract rotation, velocity, position from SE_2(3) matrix.

vee

Vee operator \((\cdot)^\vee: \mathfrak{g} \to \mathbb{R}^n\).

wedge

Wedge operator \((\cdot)^\wedge: \mathbb{R}^n \to \mathfrak{g}\).

Attributes:

dof

The degrees of freedom of the group.
classmethod Exp(x)

Shortcut method: R^n to group directly.

\[\mathrm{Exp}: \mathbb{R}^n \to G\]
classmethod Log(X)

Shortcut method: group to R^n directly.

\[\mathrm{Log}: G \to \mathbb{R}^n\]
static adjoint(X)

Adjoint representation of group element.

\[\mathrm{Ad}(\mathbf{X})\]
static adjoint_algebra(Xi)

Adjoint representation of algebra element.

\[\mathrm{ad}(\mathbf{\Xi})\]
static decompose(element_SE23)

Deprecated. Use SE23.to_components(X).

dof = 9

The degrees of freedom of the group.

Type

int

static exp(Xi)

Exponential map from algebra to group.

\[\mathrm{exp}: \mathfrak{g} \to G\]
static from_components(C, v, r)

Construct an \(SE_2(3)\) matrix from attitude, velocity, position components.

Parameters

  • C (ndarray with shape (3,3)) – DCM/rotation matrix

  • v (list[float] or ndarray with size 3) – velocity vector

  • r (list[float] or ndarray with size 3) – position vector

Returns

\(SE_2(3)\) matrix

Return type

ndarray with shape (5,5)

classmethod identity()

Returns an identity matrix of the group.

static inverse(X)

Group inverse.

static left_jacobian(x)

Group left jacobian evaluated at x in R^n

classmethod left_jacobian_inv(x)

Inverse of group left jacobian evaluated at x in R^n

static log(X)

Logarithmic map from algebra to group.

\[\mathrm{log}: G \to \mathfrak{g}\]
static normalize(X)

Eliminates rounding errors: ensures matrix is proper group element.

static odot(b)

odot operator as defined in Barfoot. I.e., an operator on an element of R^n such that

\[\mathbf{a}^\wedge \mathbf{b} = \mathbf{b}^\odot \mathbf{a}\]
static random()

Return a random element of the group.

classmethod right_jacobian(x)

Group right jacobian evaluated at x in R^n. Requires the subclass to implement left_jacobian().

classmethod right_jacobian_inv(x)

Inverse of group right jacobian evaluated at x in R^n. Requires the subclass to implement left_jacobian().

static synthesize(C, v, r)

Deprecated. Use SE23.from_components(C, v, r).

static to_components(X)

Extract rotation, velocity, position from SE_2(3) matrix.

static vee(Xi)

Vee operator \((\cdot)^\vee: \mathfrak{g} \to \mathbb{R}^n\).

static wedge(xi)

Wedge operator \((\cdot)^\wedge: \mathbb{R}^n \to \mathfrak{g}\).
